NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CASSAVA: I have gathered as much of the deadly matter from across the star system as I am safely able to.
2
1
CASSAVA: When the order is given, the collected deadly matter will be warped into this space.
3
2
CASSAVA: If everything goes as planned, the deadly matter should be completely contained by the deep oceans surrounding the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station,</color> sealing it away indefinitely.
4
3
CASSAVA: I have ordered the <color=orange>Inspired</color> to remain in stationary orbit around <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep..</color> Should this containment fail, I pray that it will catch any matter that leaks out.
5 4
CASSAVA: But before I give the order, I have released the species within the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> back to the surface using my voyager.
6 5
CASSAVA: It is my dearest hope that these species will continue to grow and learn from the universe in our stead.
7 6
CASSAVA: I only wish we could have been a part of their journey..
8 7
CASSAVA: Now, all that remains is to collapse the innumerable possibilities before me.
9 8
CASSAVA: My friends.. Daz.. I cannot wait to be with you again.
10 9
CASSAVA: The universe is.. and we are now one with it.
DSS EX5 5
INSP EX1 4
INSP EX7 4
